Charm Person Information

Description: Charm a humanoid to prevent it from attacking you. You gain Advantage on Charisma Checks in dialogue. Enemies have Advantage on Saving Throws against being Charmed When the spell ends, the target might accuse you of Charming them. Condition ends early if you or an ally hurts the target. In higher difficulty modes, the target might accuse you of enchanting them. Level: Lvl 1 spell School: Enchantment Casting Time: Ac
